Description: Checks if the given file needs additional properties to run on current system
Executables are added regardless of if they are need additional properties to run
Last modification timestamp and path of file
If file is moved or renamed a new entry is generated in appcompatcache
Manipulation likely if file`s modification timestamp not equal appcompatcache modified timestamp
New entries are only written on shutdown
Do not use AppCompatCache entries as evidence of execution - more as evidence of existence on the system based on file name - No hash available for executable here
